title: DNAOrigami
description: This element describes an optical standard constructed using the DNA origani technique.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., manufacturer name, model designation and serial number).
subCategoriesOrder.OpticalStandard: The optical standard used in this case. This might be a pre-manufactured slide, such as those produced by Argolight (http://argolight.com/), Geller MicroAnalytical Laboratory (Magnification Reference Standard MRS-4 and others; http://www.gellermicro.com/mag_standards/mrs.html), Zeiss and others. Alternatively, the standard might be a slide containing multi-colored beads of known size and emission characteristics. Finally, slides coated with specific DNA origami patterns are increasingly being used for this purpose as well.
subCategoriesOrder.DNAOrigami: This element describes an optical standard constructed using the DNA origani technique.

Type.description: This field describes the type of DNA origami-based optical standard used in this case. Currently this is fild is a simple string. However it might be substituted by an enumeration at a later stage.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.
